title: Stunning views and close to major freeways and shopping! Live at Piero
neighborhood: 616 St. Paul Ave., Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['The Piero is the most prestigious address, in urban-style elegance, that Los Angeles, California has to offer.', 'Experience gracious, apartment living in the heart of downtown.', 'Our superior location is moments from the financial district, fine dining, glamorous shopping, and vibrant nightlife.', 'Staples Center, Walt Disney Concert Hall, and Koreatown are just minutes from here.', 'All of the culture and arts that define Los Angeles are within reach when you live at The Piero.', 'With close proximity to the freeway, your commute in California is a breeze.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Italian Marble Vanities', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool (Heated for Year-Round Use)', '-Mail Room with Package Acceptance Services', '-Large Picture Windows', "-Four StarTrac Cycling Machines w/ Individual Flat-Screen TV's", '-Custom & Trimmed Camden Interior Doors', '-Yoga/Dance Studio w/ Large Flat-Screen TV and DVD Player', '-Solid Hardwood Oak Entry Doors', '-Eight Phone Line Capability', '-Closet Organizers', '-Nine Foot Ceilings', '-Frost Free Refrigerator with Ice Maker', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '616 St. Paul Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90017', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
